meanings.sent1: Her chirographical skills improved with practice.
meanings.sent2: The letter was filled with chirographical details.
meanings.sent3: His chirographical style was so neat, it looked like a printed font.
meanings.sent4: The chirographical beauty of her calligraphy mesmerized everyone.
meanings.sent5: The chirographical elegance of his signature stood out on the document.

meanings.sent2: She preferred chirographical letters over typed ones.
meanings.sent3: His chirographical shopping list was a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The chirographical contract bore the authenticity of a personal touch.
meanings.sent5: The chirographical inscription on the ancient scroll was still legible.
